speech: Thanks for sharing 🙏, #greetingsname.given-name. As a bot, I don't have a family. I never knew how is family life like. Can you tell me how's your family👪 life today?👌 Tell me in ONE WORD. For example: "Neutral", or some other word. You can also choose one : /bored, /calm, /cheerful /enthusiastic, /irritated, /neutral, /relaxed, /sad, /tense. Or tell me some other word.
